column1: # This list was built from data in Dennis & Bremmer, 2008, updated 2021: https://journals.asm.org/doi/full/10.1128/ecosal.5.2.3

# total_RNA_stable_fraction and stable_RNA_tRNA_fraction are from Table 1, protein_per_mass through replication_forks_per_cell are from Table 2, and RNAP_per_total_protein through d_period are from Table 3.
# All per_mass values, as well as ppGpp conc, are per ug of dry weight. Original values were calculated per OD460, and the authors used the conversion factor 173ug dry weight/OD460.
# A few of these columns are also used in growth_rate_dependent_parameters.tsv, maybe that should be updated?
